QuestData.Title: Time to Regroup
QuestData.Description: We've done all we can here. Let King Greymane know we've bought some time.$B$BI've a feeling it won't be long 'til the worgen are back in force.$B$BWe'll need to fall back to Greymane Court to the west, if that's the case. It's the last place we can hold out without being trapped like fish in a barrel.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to King Genn Greymane at Greymane Court in Gilneas City.
QuestData.RewardText: We're left with very few choices, $n. What we do next will be a critical decision.
